alert.note: Alert for Potomac, Seeley Lake Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Missoula County through 530 PM MDT... At 500 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Seeley Lake, or 25 miles northeast of Missoula, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Missoula County. This includes Highway 83 between mile markers 17 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for west central Montana.
